intro.summary: Around 11 years of overall IT industry experience with 5+ years of extensive experience as a Fullstack Developer primarily with React.js and Node.js. Hands-on experience in creating front end applications with React.js – single-page applications (SPA) & react isomorphic, JavaScript, Node.js, HTML, and CSS. Widely used most popular react libraries like Redux, MobX, Thunk, Saga, Maps (Google, MapBox, MapQuest, Leaflet), charts (d3, Recharts, etc.) to name a few.  Vast experience in implementing server layer with Node.js/Express. Possess experience in PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Oracle, and MS SQL databases and writing SQL scripts, procedures, triggers. Good knowledge in Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) exclusively in Agile methodology – Scrum & Kanban. Have extensive experience in system analysis, design, and development of various web applications. Committed to utilizing my skills to further the mission of a company. Proven ability to establish and maintain excellent communication and relationships with clients.

projects.project: Lowes Inc. lowes.com e-commerce website - shopping cart, checkout, and confirmation pages
Benefits Administration System (BAS), ICB Narratives, Narrative Content Management, Bella (chatbot), SDLC methodology determination, Rome, Claim reporting – Dashboard
PANAM-CMS (Corporate Banking & Customer Management), DFA Push Out (Dodd Frank Act)
